<h3 id="current-members">Current Members</h3>
    <tr>
            <td><img src="images/Nalini.jpg" width="130" ></td>
            <td>&nbsp;</td>
            
            <td><a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~nalini"><strong>Nalini Venkatasubramanian</strong></a> <br>
              Professor, Information and Computer Science
              <br> Reasearch areas:
             concurrent/distributed systems, reflective and adaptive middleware, Internet-of-things, cyberphysical systems, smart resilient communities, middleware for pervasive and mobile computing environments, multimedia systems and applications. 
             
          
          </td>
          </tr>

              Faculty Visitor
            <br> Reasearch areas:
              multimedia networking, mobile computing, broadcast/wireless networks, Internet-of-Things (IoT), networked games, cloud/fog computing, and computer networks.</li>

             </td>
          </tr>
          </tr>
    </li>
     <li><a href="http://sites.uci.edu/nailah/"target="_blank">Nailah Saleh, Alhassoun</a> (Ph.D. 2021, Associate professor in KSU), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=cdi_scopus_primary_2001733405&context=PC&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Primo%20Central&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Nailah%20saleh&offset=0">Context-aware energy optimization for perpetual IoT-based safe communities.</a>

           </td>

            </td>

          </tr>
    </li>
<li><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/zhijing" title="Zhijing" target="_blank">Zhijing Qin</a> (Ph.D. 2015, Senior Software Engineer, Pinterest Inc.), Thesis: <a href="https://escholarship.org/uc/item/0b140571">MINA: A Multinetwork INformation Architecture in Cyber Physical Systems/Internet of Things Environments.</a>
</li>
<li><a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~yez/" title="Ye" target="_blank">Ye Zhao</a> (Ph.D. 2014, Staff Member, Google Inc.), Thesis: <a href="https://escholarship.org/uc/item/4g69m7q2">Middleware Approaches to Societal Scale Information Sharing
.</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~mrrahimi/" title="reza" target="_blank">Reza Rahimi</a> (Ph.D. 2014, Research Staff Member, Samsung Research Labs), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991001203859704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=creator,exact,Rahimi,%20Mohammad%20Reza.,AND&facet=creator,exact,Rahimi,%20Mohammad%20Reza.&mode=advanced&offset=0">Qos-aware middleware for optimal service allocation in mobile cloud computing.</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~dsm/ngocdo/" title="Ngoc" target="_blank">Do Minh Ngoc</a> (Ph.D. 2014, Senior Staff Member, Arista Networks Inc.), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=cdi_proquest_journals_1557697178&context=PC&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Primo%20Central&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Do%20Minh%20Ngoc&facet=rtype,include,dissertations&offset=0">Content Delivery using Hybrid Infrastructure and Ad Hoc Networks.</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/leilajl/" title="leilajl" target="_blank">Leila Jalali</a> (Ph.D. 2012, Engineering Manager, Google Inc.), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991014831209704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Leila%20Jalali&sortby=rank&offset=0">Middleware solutions for integrated simulation environments.</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/jehanw" title="Jehan" target="_blank">Jehan Wickramasuriya</a> (Ph.D. Principal Research Engineer, Motorola Research Labs).</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/boxing/" title="Bo" target="_blank">Bo Xing</a> (Ph.D. 2009, Ericsson Research), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991028155629704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Bo%20Xing&offset=0">A middleware approach to information dissemination in heterogeneous wireless networks.</a></li>
<li>Daniel Massaguer (Ph.D. 2009, Postdoctoral Researcher, UCI), Thesis: <a href="https://www.proquest.com/docview/304849992/abstract">A semantic approach for building sentient spaces.</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~vbalasub/" title="Vidhya" target="_blank">Vidhya Balasubramanian</a> (Ph.D. 2009, Assistant Professor, Amrita University, India), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991022495429704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Vidhya%20Balasubramanian&offset=0">Supporting scalable activity modeling in simulators.</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~hjafarpo/" title="Hojjat" target="_blank">Hojjat Jafarpour</a> (Ph.D. 2009, NEC Lab), <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991027750269704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Hojjat%20Jafarpour">Customized information dissemination in distributed publish/subscribe systems.</a>
</li>
<li><a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~yunh" title="Yun">Yun Huang</a> (Ph.D. 2008, CMU), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991020998889704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Yun%20Huang&sortby=rank&facet=rtype,include,dissertations&offset=0">MAPGrid : context aware grid middleware for mobile applications.</a></li>
<li>Minyoung Kim (Ph.D. 2008, Research Sceintist, SRI International), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991021024409704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Minyoung%20Kim&offset=0">XTune : a formal methodology for cross-layer tuning of mobile real-time embedded systems.</a></li>
<li>Kyoungwoo Lee (Ph.D. 2008, Professor, Yonsei University, Korea), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991022845859704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Kyoungwoo%20Lee&offset=0">Cooperative cross-layer protection for resource constrained mobile multimedia systems.</a> </li>
<li><a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~mayur/" title="Mayur" target="_blank">Mayur Deshpande</a> (Ph.D. 2007, Google Inc.), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991020439329704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Mayur%20Deshpande&offset=0">Peer-to-peer flash dissemination.</a></li>
<li><a href="http://inside.mines.edu/~qhan/" title="Qi" target="_blank">Qi Han</a> (Ph.D. 2006, Associate Professor, Colorado School of Mines), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991032442219704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Qi%20Han&offset=0">Quality-aware context information collection.</a></li>
<li>Sebastian Gutierrez-Nolasco (Ph.D. 2007, NASA Ames Research Center), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=cdi_proquest_journals_304876561&context=PC&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Primo%20Central&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Sebastian%20Gutierrez-Nolasco&offset=0">A semantic-driven communication framework for safe adaptability.</a></li>
<li><a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~mopy/" title="Shivajit" target="_blank">Shivajit Mohapatra</a> (Ph.D. 2006, Motorola Research Labs), Thesis: <a href="https://uci.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/discovery/fulldisplay?docid=alma991033462179704701&context=L&vid=01CDL_IRV_INST:UCI&lang=en&search_scope=DN_and_CI&adaptor=Local%20Search%20Engine&tab=Everything&query=any,contains,Shivajit%20Mohapatra&offset=0">DYNAMO : Power aware middleware for distributed mobile computing.</a></li>
<hr>
</ul>
